template.name: Permanent that can be cast using {C}
template.scryfallQuery: mv<=1 (mana={0} or mana={1} or mana={C}) is:permanent

results.description:
Activate Sol Ring by tapping it, adding {C} {C}.
Cast the permanent that can be cast using {C} by paying its mana cost.
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning Sol Ring from the battlefield to your hand.
Cast Sol Ring by paying {1}. 
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning the permanent cast in step 2 from the battlefield to your hand.
Repeat.
If the permanent can be cast by paying {0}, this combo nets infinite colorless mana.

Cast Demonic Consultation by paying {B}, naming Thassa's Oracle and thus exiling your library due to you not having a card named Thassa's Oracle in your library.
Cast Thassa's Oracle by paying {U}{U}.
Thassa's Oracle enters the battlefield, causing you to win the game.

Gain life.
Sanguine Bond triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Exquisite Blood triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Cast Tainted Pact by paying {1}{B}, exiling your library.
Cast Thassa's Oracle by paying {U}{U}.
Thassa's Oracle enters the battlefield, causing you to win the game.
results.notablePrerequisites: No two cards in library share a name.

card.name: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose

results.description:
Gain life.
Vito triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Exquisite Blood triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

feature.name: Infinite mana nonland permanents you control can produce
Infinite untap of nonland permanents you control

results.description:
Activate all mana-producing nonland permanents you control by tapping them, adding at least {3}.
Activate Isochron Scepter by paying {2} and tapping it, casting a copy of Dramatic Reversal without paying it's mana cost.
Resolve Dramatic Reversal, untapping all nonland permanents you control.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Nonland permanents you control can tap to produce at least {3}.

results.description:
Activate Lotus Petal by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {U}.
Cast Lotus Petal from your graveyard for its escape cost by exiling three cards besides Brain Freeze from your graveyard.
Repeat from step 1 one additional time.
Cast Brain Freeze either from your hand by paying {1}{U}, or from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {1}{U} and exiling three cards from your graveyard.
Brain Freeze's storm ability triggers, creating at least two copies of Brain Freeze targeting yourself, and any remaining copies targeting an opponent.
Resolve each Brain Freeze, causing yourself to mill nine cards and, if applicable, an opponent to mill three cards for each Brain Freeze remaining.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have at least six other cards in your graveyard, plus an additional four cards if Brain Freeze is in your graveyard.

results.description:
Activate Lion's Eye Diamond by discarding your hand and sacrificing it, adding {U}{U}{U}.
Cast Lion's Eye Diamond from your graveyard for its escape cost by exiling three cards besides Brain Freeze from your graveyard.
Cast Brain Freeze from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {1}{U} and exiling three cards from your graveyard.
Brain Freeze's storm ability triggers, creating at least one copy of Brain Freeze targeting yourself, and any remaining copies targeting an opponent.
Resolve each Brain Freeze, causing yourself to mill six cards and, if applicable, an opponent to mill three cards for each Brain Freeze remaining.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have at least six other cards in hand and/or graveyard.

results.description:
Activate Lion's Eye Diamond by discarding your hand and sacrificing it, adding {R}{R}{R}.
Cast Wheel of Fortune from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {2}{R} and exiling 3 cards from your graveyard.
Resolve Wheel of Fortune, causing each player to discard their hand and draw seven cards.
Cast Lion's Eye Diamond from your graveyard for its escape cost by exiling 3 cards from your graveyard.
 Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have at least six other cards in hand and/or graveyard.

results.description:
Cast Twinflame by paying its mana cost, targeting a creature you control.
Holding priority, cast Dualcaster Mage by paying {1}{R}{R}.
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, it triggers, copying Twinflame, targeting Dualcaster Mage.
Resolve the copy of Twinflame, creating a token copy of Dualcaster Mage.
Repeat from step 3.
results.notablePrerequisites:
You control at least one creature.
You have enough mana to cast Twinflame

feature.name: Infinite draw triggers for all players

results.description:
Cast Jeska's Will from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {2}{R} and exiling three other cards from your graveyard, adding at least six {R}.
Cast Wheel of Fortune from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {2}{R} and exiling three other cards from your graveyard, causing each player to discard their hand and draw seven cards.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites:
You have at least six additional cards in your graveyard, plus an additional six cards between your hand and/or graveyard.
An opponent has at least six cards in hand.

template.name: Permanent that can be cast using {C}{C}

results.description:
Activate Mana Vault by tapping it, adding {C}{C}{C}.
Cast the permanent that can be cast using {C}{C} from your hand by paying its mana cost.
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning Mana Vault from the battlefield to your hand.
Cast Mana Vault by paying {1}.
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning the permanent cast in step 2 from the battlefield to your hand.
Repeat.
If the permanent can be cast using {C} or less, this combo nets infinite colorless mana.

Animate the land.
Cast Springheart Nantuko for its bestow cost by paying {1}{G}, attaching it to the animated land.
Play any land.
When the land enters the battlefield, Springheart Nantuko and Tireless Provisioner trigger.
Resolve the Tireless Provisioner trigger, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {G}.
Resolve the Springheart Nantuko trigger, causing you to pay {1}{G} to create a token copy of the land it is attached to.
When the land token enters the battlefield, Tireless Provisioner and Springheart Nantuko trigger.
Holding priority, activate the land token by tapping it, adding at least {1}.
Repeat from step 5.
results.manaNeeded: {2}{G} plus enough mana to animate the land
results.easyPrerequisites:
You have a land card in hand.
You are able to play a land this turn.

results.description:
Draw a card.
Niv-Mizzet trigger, dealing 1 damage to any target opponent.
Curiosity triggers, allowing you to draw a card.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Curiosity attached to Niv-Mizzet.
You have a way to draw a card.
Your library is greater than opponent life total.

results.description:
Animate the land.
Cast Springheart Nantuko for its bestow cost by paying {1}{G}, attaching it to the animated land.
Play any land.
When the land enters the battlefield, Springheart Nantuko and Lotus Cobra trigger.
Resolve the Lotus Cobra trigger, adding {G}.
Resolve the Springheart Nantuko trigger, causing you to pay {1}{G} to create a token copy of the land it is attached to.
When the land token enters the battlefield, Lotus Cobra and Springheart Nantuko trigger.
Holding priority, activate the land token by tapping it, adding at least {1}.
Repeat from step 5.
results.manaNeeded: {2}{G} plus enough mana to animate the land
results.easyPrerequisites:
You have a land card in hand.
You are able to play a land this turn.

results.description:
Activate Phyrexian Altar by sacrificing Gravecrawler, adding {B}.
Cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard by paying {B}.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control an additional Zombie.

card.name: Vito, Thorn of the Dusk Rose

results.description:
Gain life.
Vito triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Bloodthirsty Conqueror triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.notes: If you control additional Squirrels, you can sacrifice them as well to get infinite Treasure tokens.

feature.name: Reduce each opposing creature's toughness to 0

results.description:
Activate Chatterfang by paying {B} and sacrificing another Squirrel.
When the Squirrel dies, Pitiless Plunderer triggers, creating a 1/1 Squirrel creature token and a Treasure token.
Activate a Treasure token by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Repeat.
Resolve all Chatterfang abilities, causing any number of target creatures to get +1/-1 until end of turn any number of times.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control an additional Squirrel.

results.description:
Cause one or more opponents to lose life.
Mindcrank triggers once for each life loss event, causing that player to mill cards equal to the amount of life lost.
Bloodchief Ascension triggers once for each card milled, causing that player to lose 2 life and you to gain 2 life for each trigger.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Three or more quest counters on Bloodchief Ascension.
You have a way to make an opponent lose life.

results.description:
Activate Basalt Monolith's first ability by tapping it, adding {C}{C}{C}{C}.
Activate Basalt Monolith's last ability by paying {3}, untapping it.
Repeat.

Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing Reassembling Skeleton, adding {C}{C}.
When Reassembling Skeleton dies, Pitiless Plunderer triggers, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure token by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Activate Reassembling Skeleton by paying {1}{B}, returning it from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Repeat.

Activate Aetherflux Reservoir by paying 50 life, dealing 50 damage to target opponent.
Exquisite Blood triggers, causing you to gain you 50 life.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have at least 51 life.

results.description:
Gain life.
Marauding Blight-Priest triggers, causing each opponent to lose 1 life.
Exquisite Blood triggers for each opponent that lost life.
Resolve a Exquisite Blood trigger, gaining 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Activate Basalt Monolith's first ability by tapping it, adding {C}{C}{C}.
Activate Basalt Monolith's last ability by paying {3}.
Rings of Brighthearth triggers, causing you to pay {2} to copy Basalt Monolith's last ability.
Resolve the copy of Basalt Monolith's last ability, untapping it.
Activate Basalt Monolith's first ability by tapping it, adding {C}{C}{C}.
Resolve the Basalt Monolith ability from step 2, untapping it.
Repeat.

Activate Sensei's Divining Top by tapping it, drawing a card and then putting Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library.
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying 1 life.
Aetherflux Reservoir triggers, gaining you 1 life for each spell you have cast this turn.
Repeat until your life total is 52 or greater.
Activate Aetherflux Reservoir by paying 50 life, dealing 50 damage to any target.
Repeat.
results.easyPrerequisites: Your life total is at least 2.

results.description:
Activate Heliod by paying {1}{W}, giving Walking Ballista lifelink until end of turn.
Activate Walking Ballista's second ability by removing a +1/+1 counter, dealing 1 damage to any target.
Walking Ballista's lifelink triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Heliod triggers, putting a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: Walking Ballista has at least two +1/+1 counters on it.

results.description:
Cast Sol Ring by paying {1}.
Displacer Kitten triggers, blinking Teferi.
Activate Sol Ring by tapping it, adding {C}{C}.
Activate Teferi's second loyalty ability by removing three loyalty counters from it, returning Sol Ring from the battlefield to your hand and drawing a card.
Repeat.
Cast Maddening Cacophony with kicker by paying {4}{U}{U}, causing each opponent to mill their entire library.

Gain life.
Sanguine Bond triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Bloodthirsty Conqueror triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Gain life.
Enduring Tenacity triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Exquisite Blood triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Activate Peregrin Took by sacrificing three Foods.
Nuka-Cola Vending Machine triggers three times, creating three tapped Treasure and three tapped Food tokens.
Resolve the Peregrin Took ability, causing you to draw a card.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control at least three Foods.

results.description:
Activate Sensei's Divining Top by tapping it, causing you to draw a card and put Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library.
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying {0}.
Repeat

feature.name: Near-infinite card draw for target opponent
Near-infinite draw triggers for target opponent

results.description:
Cast Peer into the Abyss by paying {4}{B}{B}{B}, causing an opponent to draw cards equal to half their library size and lose half their life total, rounded up.
Sheoldred's second ability triggers for each card drawn this way.
Resolve the first Sheoldred trigger, causing the opponent to lose 2 life.
Repeat step 3 until the opponent loses the game due to having zero or less life.
results.notablePrerequisites: An opponent has a library size that is at least half their life total.

results.description:
Activate Basalt Monolith's first ability by tapping it, adding {4}.
Activate Basalt Monolith's last ability by paying {3}, untapping it.
Repeat.

Cast Molten Duplication by paying its mana cost, targeting a creature you control.
Holding priority, cast Dualcaster Mage by paying {1}{R}{R}.
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, it triggers, copying Molten Duplication, targeting Dualcaster Mage.
Resolve the copy of Molten Duplication, creating a token copy of Dualcaster Mage.
Repeat from step 3.
results.notablePrerequisites:
You control at least one creature.
You have enough mana to cast Molten Duplication

results.description:
Cast Felidar Guardian by paying its mana cost.
When Felidar Guardian enters, it triggers, blinking Restoration Angel.
When Restoration Angel enters, it triggers, blinking Felidar Guardian.
Repeat from step 2.

feature.name: Near-infinite +1/+1 counters on target Army you control
Near-infinite card draw for target opponent
Near-infinite draw triggers for target opponent

results.description:
Cast Peer into the Abyss by paying {4}{B}{B}{B}, targeting an opponent whose library size is larger than or equal to their life total.
Resolve Peer into the Abyss, causing that opponent to draw cards equal to half their library size and causing them to lose half their life total, rounded up.
Orcish Bowmasters triggers for each card drawn, dealing 1 damage to the opponent for each card drawn this way and putting that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.
The opponent loses the game due to having zero or less life.
results.notablePrerequisites: An opponent has a library size which is larger than or equal to their life total.

results.description:
Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing the persist creature.
When the persist creature dies, its persist ability triggers if it didn't have a -1/-1 counter on it, and its undying ability triggers if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the persist trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Resolve the undying trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Repeat.

feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce

results.description:
Activate Peregrine Drake by paying {1}{U}, blinking itself.
Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, triggering itself and Deadeye Navigator.
Resolve the Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping up to five lands you control.
Resolve the Deadeye Navigator trigger, repairing Deadeye Navigator and Peregrine Drake.
Activate up to five lands you control by tapping them, adding at least {2}{U}.
Repeat.
Once you have infinite mana, you may use Deadeye Navigator's abilities to blink any number of creatures you control any number of times.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Deadeye Navigator is paired with Peregrine Drake.
You control up to five lands that can tap to produce {2}{U}.

results.description:
Proceed to your cleanup step, and discard Dakmor Salvage and any other card(s) as needed down to your maximum hand size.
The Gitrog Monster triggers, causing you to mill two cards and return Dakmor Salvage from your graveyard to your hand.
Repeat, as you will still be over your maximum hand size and will be required to discard again.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a number of cards in hand that is above your maximum hand size.

results.description:
Gain life.
Enduring Tenacity triggers, causing an opponent to lose 1 life.
Bloodthirsty Conqueror triggers, causing you to gain 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Draw a card.
Niv-Mizzet triggers, dealing 1 damage to an opponent.
Ophidian Eye triggers, allowing you to draw a card.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Ophidian Eye attached to Niv-Mizzet.
You have a way to draw a card.

results.description:
Activate Phyrexian Altar by sacrificing the persist creature.
When the persist creature dies, its persist ability triggers if it didn't have a -1/-1 counter on it, and its undying ability triggers if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the persist trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Resolve the undying trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Repeat.

Cast Sol Ring by paying its mana cost.
Tidespout Tyrant triggers, returning a nontoken permanent that can be cast using {C} from the battlefield to your hand.
Activate Sol Ring by tapping it, adding {C}{C}.
Cast the nontoken permanent returned in step 2 by paying its mana cost.
Tidespout Tyrant triggers, returning Sol Ring from the battlefield to your hand.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control a nontoken permanent that can be cast using {C}.

results.description:
Activate Carrion Feeder by sacrificing the persist creature.
When the persist creature dies, its persist ability triggers if it didn't have a -1/-1 counter on it, and its undying ability triggers if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the persist trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Resolve the undying trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the Carrion Feeder ability.
Repeat.

feature.name: Infinite mana lands you control can produce
Infinite untap of lands you control

results.description:
Activate up to five lands by tapping them, adding at least {2}{U}.
Cast Ghostly Flicker by paying {2}{U}, blinking Archaeomancer and Peregrine Drake.
When Archaeomancer and Peregrine Drake enter the battlefield, their abilities trigger.
Resolve the Archaeomancer trigger, returning Ghostly Flicker to your hand from your graveyard.
Resolve the Peregrine Drake trigger, untapping up to five lands.
Repeat.
If you control five lands that can tap to produce at least {3}{U}, this combo nets infinite mana, and you may blink any other permanent besides Peregrine Drake.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control up to five lands that can tap to produce at least {2}{U}.

results.description:
Draw a card.
Niv-Mizzet triggers, dealing 1 damage to any target.
Niv-Mizzet's soulbond ability triggers, drawing you a card.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Tandem Lookout paired with Niv-Mizzet.
You have a way to draw a card.
Your library is greater than opponent life total.

results.notes: Depending on what artifact you choose, additional results may be added.

feature.name: Near-infinite mana of colors among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control

results.description:
Activate Grinding Station by tapping it and sacrificing the artifact with mana value 0, causing you to mill three cards.
Cast the artifact from your graveyard for its escape cost by paying {0} and exiling three cards from your graveyard.
When the artifact enters the battlefield, Grinding Station triggers, untapping Grinding Station.
Repeat.

feature.name: Infinite colored mana that can only be spent to cast creature spells

results.description:
Activate Food Chain by exiling Squee, adding {R}{R}{R}{R} that can only be spent to cast creature spells.
Cast Squee from exile by paying {1}{R}{R}.
Repeat.

feature.name: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you

results.description:
Cast The One Ring by paying {4}.
Displacer Kitten triggers, blinking Teferi.
When The One Ring enters the battlefield, its first ability triggers, causing you to gain protection from everything until your next turn.
Activate Teferi's second loyalty ability by removing three loyalty counters from it, returning The One Ring to your hand from the battlefield and causing you to draw a card.
Repeat during each of your turns.

Activate Phyrexian Altar by sacrificing Reassembling Skeleton, adding {1}.
When Reassembling Skeleton dies, Pitiless Plunderer triggers, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure token by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Activate Reassembling Skeleton by paying {1}{B}, returning it from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Repeat.

Cast Peer Into the Abyss targeting an opponent.
That player loses half their life and draws half their library.
They are then dealt damage by Underworld Dreams equal to the amount of cards they drew.
That player loses the game.
results.notablePrerequisites: An opponent has cards in their library greater than their life total.

results.description:
Draw a card.
Niv-Mizzet, Parun's first ability triggers, dealing 1 damage to an opponent.
Niv-Mizzet, Visionary triggers, causing you to draw a card.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to draw a card.

results.notes: This combo will also deal damage to you equal to 13 times the number of creatures you control. It is recommended that your life total is above this number to ensure you don't lose the game from the damage if your opponents will not take lethal damage from this combo.
results.description:
Cast Blasphemous Act by paying at most {8}{R}, dealing 13 damage to each creature.
Repercussion triggers for each creature dealt damage this way.
Resolve the first Repercussion trigger, dealing 13 damage to an opponent.
Repeat step 3 for each Repercussion trigger, ensuring to resolve all triggers that would damage your opponent(s) first.

Activate Sensei's Divining Top by tapping it, causing you to draw a card and put Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library.
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying {0}.
Repeat

Activate Peregrin Took by sacrificing three Foods.
Experimental Confectioner's second ability triggers three times, creating three 1/1 Rat creature tokens and three Food artifact tokens.
Resolve the Peregrin Took ability, causing you to draw a card.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control at least three Foods.

feature.name: Infinite mana creatures you control can produce
Infinite untap of creatures you control

results.description:
Deal combat damage to a player with the creature that has The Reaver Cleaver attached.
The creature triggers, creating at least six Treasure tokens.
Move to your postcombat main phase.
Activate five Treasure tokens by tapping and sacrificing them, adding {3}{R}{R}.
Activate Aggravated Assault by paying {3}{R}{R}, untapping all creatures you control and causing you to get an additional combat and main phase after this one.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites:
The Reaver Cleaver attached to a creature with power five or greater that can attack this turn.
An opponent is unable to block the creature with The Reaver Cleaver attached.

results.description:
Activate Krenko by tapping it, creating a number of 1/1 Goblin creature tokens equal to the number of Goblins you control.
Activate Skirk Prospector by sacrificing Krenko, adding {R}.
Choose to return Krenko to the command zone from your graveyard.
Activate Skirk Prospector by sacrificing a Goblin, adding {R}.
Repeat step 4 until you have enough mana to cast Krenko.
Cast Krenko from the command zone by paying {2}{R}{R} plus commander tax.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control a number of Goblins that is equal to or greater than six plus Krenko's commander tax.

results.description:
Activate Kiki-Jiki by tapping it, creating a token copy of Zealous Conscripts with haste.
When the Zealous Conscripts token enters, it triggers, untapping Kiki-Jiki
Repeat.

Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing the persist or undying creature, adding {C}{C}.
When the persist or undying creature dies, its persist or undying ability and Nim Deathmantle trigger.
Resolve the Nim Deathmantle trigger, choosing not to pay.
Resolve the creature's trigger, returning it from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 or -1/-1 counter on it.
Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing the persist or undying creature, adding {C}{C}.
When the persist or undying creature dies, Nim Deathmantle triggers, causing you to pay {4} to return the persist or undying creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Repeat.

results.notes: Once you have infinite mana, you may use it to activate Staff of Domination's other abilities.

feature.name: Infinite untap of creatures you control
Infinite mana creatures you control can produce

results.description:
Activate Priest of Titania by tapping it, adding at least {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}.
Activate Staff of Domination's third ability by paying {3} and tapping it, untapping Priest of Titania.
Activate Staff of Domination's first ability by paying {1}, untapping it.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Priest of Titania does not have summoning sickness. There are at least five Elves on the battlefield.

results.description:
Activate Viscera Seer by sacrificing the persist creature.
When the persist creature dies, its persist ability triggers if it didn't have a -1/-1 counter on it, and its undying ability triggers if it didn't have a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the persist trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a -1/-1 counter on it.
Resolve the undying trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the Viscera Seer ability.
Repeat.

Gain life.
Marauding Blight-Priest triggers, causing each opponent to lose 1 life.
Bloodthirsty Conqueror triggers for each opponent that lost life.
Resolve a Bloodthirsty Conqueror trigger, gaining 1 life.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a way to gain life.

results.description:
Deal combat damage to an opponent with the creature that has Sword of Feast and Famine attached.
Sword of Feast and Famine triggers, causing that opponent to discard a card, and you to untap all lands you control.
Proceed to your postcombat main phase.
Activate all mana producing lands you control by tapping them, adding at least {3}{R}{R}.
Activate Aggravated Assault by paying {3}{R}{R}, untapping all creatures you control and causing you to get an additional combat and main phase after this phase.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Sword of Feast and Famine attached to a creature that can attack this turn.
An opponent is unable to block and kill the creature with Sword of Feast and Famine attached.
Lands you control can tap to produce at least {3}{R}{R}.

template.name: Extra Turn Spell
template.scryfallQuery: o:take o:"extra turn" -o:"lose the game" (t:instant or t:sorcery) -o:"temporal extortion" -o:"flip a coin" -o:"time or knowledge" -o:"if an opponent"

results.description:
Cast the extra turn spell by paying its mana cost.
Holding priority, activate Isochron Scepter by paying {2} and tapping it, casting a copy of Narset's Reversal.
Resolve the copy of Narset's Reversal, causing you to copy the extra turn spell, and return the original extra turn spell to your hand.
Resolve the copy of the extra turn spell, causing you to take at least one extra turn after this one.
Repeat each turn.
results.manaNeeded: {2} plus enough mana to cast the extra turn spell each turn

feature.name: Infinite mana creatures you control can produce
Infinite untap of creatures you control

results.description:
At the beginning of your combat phase, Helm of the Host triggers, creating a nonlegendary token copy of Aurelia.
Declare the token Aurelia as an attacker.
The token Aurelia triggers, causing you to untap all creatures you control and get an additional combat phase after this one.
Repeat each combat phase.
results.notablePrerequisites: Helm attached to Aurelia.

results.description:
Cast Vraska by paying {4}{B}{B}, causing it to enter with at least ten loyalty counters due to Vorinclex.
Activate Vraska's third loyalty ability by removing nine loyalty counters from it, causing target opponent to get enough poison counters such that they will have at least ten poison counters.
The opponent loses the game due to having ten or more poison counters.
results.notablePrerequisites: An opponent has eight or fewer poison counters.

results.description:
Activate Sensei's Divining Top by tapping it, causing you to draw a card and put Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library.
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying {0}.
Repeat

Cast Saw in Half by paying its mana cost, targeting a creature you control.
Holding priority, cast Dualcaster Mage by paying {1}{R}{R}.
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, it triggers, copying Saw in Half, targeting Dualcaster Mage.
Resolve the copy of Saw in Half, destroying Dualcaster Mage and creating two token copies of it with half its toughness and power, rounded up each time.
Repeat from step 3.
results.notablePrerequisites:
You control at least one creature.
You have enough mana to cast Saw in Half

results.description:
Cast Peer into the Abyss by paying {4}{B}{B}{B}, causing you to draw half your library and lose half your life total, rounding up each time.
Psychosis Crawler triggers for each card you drew, causing each opponent to lose life equal to the number of cards you drew.
results.easyPrerequisites: Your life total is at least 2.

results.description:
Draw a card.
Niv-Mizzet triggers, dealing 1 damage to any target.
Curiosity triggers, allowing you to draw a card.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites:
Curiosity attached to Niv-Mizzet.
You have a way to draw a card.
Your library is greater than opponent life total.

results.description:
Cast Heat Shimmer by paying its mana cost, targeting a creature you control.
Holding priority, cast Dualcaster Mage by paying {1}{R}{R}.
When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, it triggers, copying Heat Shimmer, targeting Dualcaster Mage.
Resolve the copy of Heat Shimmer, creating a token copy of Dualcaster Mage.
Repeat from step 3.
results.notablePrerequisites:
You control at least one creature.
You have enough mana to cast Heat Shimmer

results.description:
Activate Warren Soultrader by paying 1 life and sacrificing Gravecrawler.
When Gravecrawler dies, Blood Artist triggers, causing you to gain 1 life and target opponent to lose 1 life.
Resolve the Warren Soultrader ability, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard by paying {B}.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Your life total is at least 2.

feature.name: Put all Equipment from your library onto the battlefield

results.description:
At the beginning of your combat phase, Helm of the Host triggers, creating a nonlegendary token copy of Godo with haste.
The token Godo enters the battlefield, causing you to search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield.
Declare the token Godo as an attacker.
The token Godo triggers, untapping it and all Samurai you control and causing you to get an additional combat phase after this one.
Repeat each combat phase.
results.notablePrerequisites: Helm of the Host attached to Godo.

results.description:
Activate Krenko by tapping it, creating a number of 1/1 Goblin creature tokens equal to the number of Goblins you control.
Activate Skirk Prospector by sacrificing Krenko, adding {R}.
Choose to return Krenko to the command zone from your graveyard.
Activate Skirk Prospector by sacrificing a Goblin, adding {R}.
Repeat step 4 until you have enough mana to cast Krenko.
Cast Krenko from the command zone by paying {2}{R}{R} plus commander tax.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control a number of Goblins that is equal to or greater than six plus Krenko's commander tax.

results.description:
Cast Mox Opal by paying {0}.
Displacer Kitten triggers, blinking Teferi.
Activate Mox Opal by tapping it, adding one mana of any color.
Activate Teferi's second loyalty ability by removing three loyalty counters from it, returning Mox Opal from the battlefield to your hand and drawing a card.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control at least two artifacts.

results.description:
Cast Jeska's Will by paying {2}{R}, targeting an opponent with at least 7 cards in hand.
Holding priority, cast Reiterate with buyback by paying {4}{R}{R}, creating a copy of Jeska's Will.
Resolve the Jeska's Will copy, adding at least seven {R}.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: An opponent with at least seven cards in hand.

results.description:
Cast Scurry Oak by paying {2}{G}.
Ivy Lane Denizen triggers, putting a +1/+1 counter on Scurry Oak.
Scurry Oak's last ability triggers, allowing you to create a 1/1 Squirrel token.
Repeat from step 2.

results.notes: Once you have infinite mana, you may use it to activate Staff of Domination's other abilities.

feature.name: Infinite untap of creatures you control
Infinite mana creatures you control can produce

results.description:
Activate Elvish Archdruid by tapping it, adding at least {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}.
Activate Staff of Domination's third ability by paying {3} and tapping it, untapping Elvish Archdruid.
Activate Staff of Domination's first ability by paying {1}, untapping it.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Elvish Archdruid does not have summoning sickness. You control at least five Elves.

results.notes: You must choose a persist or undying creature that does not have flying - otherwise the Luminous Broodmoth triggers do not occur.
results.description:
Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing the persist or undying creature, adding {C}{C}.
When the creature dies, its persist or undying ability triggers if it doesn't have a -1/-1 counter or +1/+1 counter on it respectively, and Luminous Broodmoth triggers if the creature didn't have flying.
Resolve the persist or undying trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with either a -1/-1 counter or a +1/+1 counter on it.
Resolve the Luminous Broodmoth trigger, if applicable, returning the creature from your graveyard to the battlefield with a flying counter on it if the creature is still in your graveyard.
Repeat.

Activate any nontoken creature you control except Quirion Ranger by tapping it, adding {G}.
Activate Quirion Ranger by returning itself from the battlefield to your hand, untapping the creature tapped for mana.
Cast Quirion Ranger by paying {G}.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You control a nontoken creature other than Quirion Ranger that does not have summoning sickness.

results.notes: Once you have infinite mana, you may use it to activate Staff of Domination's other abilities.

feature.name: Infinite mana creatures you control can produce
Infinite untap of creatures you control

results.description:
Activate Marwyn by tapping it, adding at least {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}.
Activate Staff of Domination's third ability by paying {3} and tapping it, untapping Marwyn.
Activate Staff of Domination's first ability by paying {1}, untapping it.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Marwyn does not have summoning sickness, and has power 5 or greater.

results.description:
Activate Carrion Feeder by sacrificing Gravecrawler.
Cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard by paying {0}.
Repeat.

Cast Maddening Cacophony with kicker by paying {4}{U}{U}, causing each opponent to mill cards equal to half their library size, rounded up.
At the beginning of your end step, Fraying Sanity triggers, causing the opponent enchanted by Fraying Sanity to mill cards equal to the number of cards put into their graveyard this turn.

results.notes: The amount of damage this combo deals is highly variable by how many Dragons you control and the result of the d20 roll. The more Dragons you control, the more damage will be dealt. It can also be repeated, if needed.
results.description:
Deal combat damage using Ancient Gold Dragon.
Ancient Gold Dragon triggers, causing you to roll a d20 and create that many 1/1 Faerie Dragon creature tokens.
When the Faerie Dragons enter the battlefield, Dragon Tempest's second ability triggers that many times.
Resolve the first trigger, dealing damage to any target equal to the number of Dragons you control.
Repeat step 4 for each remaining trigger.
results.notablePrerequisites: Ancient Gold Dragon does not have summoning sickness and cannot be blocked by an opponent.

results.notes: This combo will result in a mandatory infinite loop. Left unchecked, this will cause the game to end in a draw.

feature.name: Infinitely powerful creature until end of turn

results.description:
Cast Polyraptor by paying {6}{G}{G}.
When Polyraptor enters the battlefield, Marauding Raptor triggers, dealing 2 damage to Polyraptor.
Polyraptor triggers, creating a token copy of itself.
Repeat from step 2 using the new Polyraptor token instead.

uses.battlefieldCardState: attached to a creature you control

results.description:
Activate Sensei's Divining Top by tapping it, causing you to draw a card and put Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library.
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying {0}.
Repeat

Cast Mana Geyser by paying {3}{R}{R}.
Holding priority, cast Reiterate with buyback by paying {4}{R}{R}, creating a copy of Mana Geyser and returning Reiterate to your hand.
Resolve the copy of Mana Geyser, adding at least seven {R}.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: Opponents control at least seven tapped lands.

results.description:
Activate Ashnod's Altar by sacrificing Gravecrawler, adding {C}{C}.
When Gravecrawler dies, Pitiless Plunderer triggers, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure token by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard by paying {B}.
Repeat.

Activate Warren Soultrader by paying 1 life and sacrificing Gravecrawler.
When Gravecrawler dies, Zulaport Cutthroat triggers, causing you to gain 1 life and each opponent to lose 1 life.
Resolve the Warren Soultrader ability, creating a Treasure token.
Activate the Treasure by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard by paying {B}.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Your life total is at least 2.

results.notes:
Once you have infinite Treasure tokens, you may repeat this loop spending mana from Treasures instead of Eldrazi Spawns in step 7, giving you infinite Eldrazi Spawn tokens.
Once you have infinite Treasure tokens, you may repeat this loop spending mana from Treasures instead of the creature tokens, giving you infinite creature tokens.
results.description:
Activate Viscera Seer by sacrificing Reassembling Skeleton.
When Reassembling Skeleton dies, Pitiless Plunderer and Pawn of Ulamog trigger.
Resolve the Pitiless Plunderer trigger, creating a Treasure token.
Resolve the Pawn of Ulamog trigger, creating a creature token.
Resolve the Viscera Seer ability.
Activate the Treasure by tapping and sacrificing it, adding {B}.
Activate the creature token by sacrificing it, adding {C}.
When the creature token dies, Pitiless Plunderer triggers, creating a Treasure token.
Activate Reassembling Skeleton by paying {1}{B}, returning it to the battlefield from your graveyard.
Repeat

results.notes: The combo stops creating enough Treasures once you have one opponent remaining. If you start the combo with three or more opponents, you will make additional Treasures each iteration, which you could use for extra iterations while you only have one opponent. Depending on the life totals of your opponents and your deck size, the combo may also stop once your library is empty.
results.description:
Declare Glint-Horn Buccaneer as an attacker.
Holding priority, activate Glint-Horn Buccaneer by paying {1}{R} and discarding a card.
Glint-Horn Buccaneer triggers, dealing 1 damage to each opponent.
Malcolm triggers, creating a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage this way.
Resolve the Glint-Horn Buccaneer ability, causing you to draw a card.
Activate two Treasures by tapping and sacrificing them, adding {1}{R}.
Repeat from step 2.
results.easyPrerequisites:
You have a card in hand.
You have at least two opponents.

template.name: Permanent that can be cast using {C}{C}

results.description:
Activate Mana Crypt by tapping it, adding {C}{C}.
Cast the permanent that can be cast using {C}{C} from your hand by paying its mana cost.
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning Mana Crypt from the battlefield to your hand.
Cast Mana Crypt by paying {0}.
Hullbreaker Horror triggers, returning the permanent cast in step 2 from the battlefield to your hand.
Repeat.
If the permanent can be cast using {C} or less, this combo nets infinite colorless mana.

feature.name: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you

results.description:
Play Glacial Chasm either from your hand or from your graveyard.
When Glacial Chasm enters the battlefield, its second ability triggers, causing you to sacrifice another land you control.
Play any land from your graveyard.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, Glacial Chasm's cumulative upkeep ability triggers, allowing you to choose not to pay the cost and sacrifice it instead.
Repeat.

results.notes: This combo creates an infinite amount of copies of the cast Eldrazi spell on the stack.

feature.name: Infinite copies of abilities you control on the stack
Infinite copies of the cast Eldrazi

results.description:
Cast any colorless Eldrazi spell by paying its mana cost, triggering Ulalek twice, Echoes of Eternity twice and Glaring Fleshraker's first ability twice.
Resolve a Ulalek trigger, causing you to pay {C}{C} to copy the colorless spell, the remaining Ulalek trigger, both Echoes of Eternity triggers and both Glaring Fleshraker triggers.
Resolve the first Glaring Fleshraker trigger, creating a 0/1 Eldrazi Spawn creature token.
When the Eldrazi Spawn enters the battlefield, Glaring Fleshraker's second ability triggers, dealing 1 damage to each opponent.
Activate the Eldrazi Spawn by sacrificing it, adding {C}.
Repeat from step 3 one additional time.
Repeat from step 2.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a colorless Eldrazi card in hand with the mana to cast it.

results.description:
Activate Sense's Divining Top's second ability by tapping it, causing you to draw a card and put Sensei's Divining Top on top of your library from the battlefield.
Sheoldred triggers, causing you to gain 2 life
Cast Sensei's Divining Top from the top of your library by paying 1 life.
Repeat.

Animate the land.
Cast Springheart Nantuko for its bestow cost by paying {1}{G}, attaching it to the animated land.
Play any land.
When the land enters the battlefield, Springheart Nantuko and Nissa trigger.
Resolve the Nissa trigger, adding {G}.
Resolve the Springheart Nantuko trigger, causing you to pay {1}{G} to create a token copy of the land it is attached to.
When the land token enters the battlefield, Nissa and Springheart Nantuko trigger.
Holding priority, activate the land token by tapping it, adding at least {1}.
Repeat from step 5.
results.manaNeeded: {2}{G} plus enough mana to animate the land
results.easyPrerequisites:
You have a land card in hand.
You are able to play a land this turn.

feature.name: Infinite power for creatures you control until end of turn

results.description:
Cast Haze of Rage with buyback by paying {3}{R}, triggering its storm ability and Storm-Kiln Artist.
Resolve Haze of Rage's storm ability, creating a copy of Haze of Rage for each spell you have previously cast this turn.
Storm-Kiln Artist triggers once for each copy created this way.
Resolve all Storm-Kiln Artist triggers from step 3, creating at least three Treasure tokens.
Resolve each Haze of Rage copy from step 2, causing all creatures you control to get +1/+0 until end of turn for each copy.
Resolve the Storm-Kiln Artist trigger from step 1, creating a Treasure token.
Resolve Haze of Rage, causing all creatures you control to get +1/+0 until end of turn and returning Haze of Rage to your hand.
Activate four Treasure tokens you control by tapping and sacrificing them, adding {3}{R}.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have cast at least three spells this turn.

results.description:
Proceed to your cleanup step, and discard a land and any other card(s) as needed down to your maximum hand size.
The Gitrog Monster triggers, causing you to mill two cards and return a land from your graveyard to your hand.
Repeat, as you will still be over your maximum hand size and will be required to discard again.
results.notablePrerequisites: You have a number of cards in hand that is above your maximum hand size, one of which must be a land card.

results.notes: Once you have infinite mana, you may use it to activate Staff of Domination's other abilities.

feature.name: Infinite mana creatures you control can produce
Infinite untap of creatures you control

results.description:
Activate Circle of Dreams Druid by tapping it, adding at least {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}.
Activate Staff of Domination's third ability by paying {3} and tapping it, untapping Circle of Dreams Druid.
Activate Staff of Domination's first ability by paying {1}, untapping it.
Repeat.
results.notablePrerequisites: Circle of Dreams Druid does not have summoning sickness. You control at least five creatures.
